title: New Updates to Carolingian UI!
content:
New features from v1.15.1:

  • Scaling: Option to resize elements and some fonts of Carolingian UI;
  • Root folders: Added option to show root folders from scene directory to Scene Navigation;

Updates from v1.14.0:

  • Scene Preview: shows thumbnail preview of the scene in navigation (turn off in settings);
  • Back Button: on top bar, go back to a previous scene (default option), or to go back from a folder to default view (configure in settings);
  • Scene Icons: Hide/Show the icons from the nav bar and scene directory in settings;
  • Click to View: Double click to activate a scene, single click to view, both in the nav bar and the scene directory
  • Custom Label for Default Navigation: From Settings, specify a custom name for the default navigation. By default, no label is set.

And a few other details and settings options! Check more on Github repo or Discord
